p:
To calculate CFR, we used the following formula:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ {\text{CFR }} = {\text{ deaths at day x }}/{\text{ cases at day x}} - \left\{ {\text{T}} \right\} $$\end{document}
CFR
=
deaths at day x
/
cases at day x
-
T
where T: average time period from case confirmation to death.
